experience: You and Carlos both know Aaron D. Bare, Michael Toll, and 118 others
Arizona Coyotes Paw Patrol merchandise photo shoot.

Created Hispanos USA, part of CS Media & VIProductions: a communications, media, marketing organization to serve Spanish speaking communities across the United States of America. Founded Globe Magazine in NYC, La Voz, a newspaper in NC and Hispanos Unidos Magazine. Executive Produced Hispanics Today Television Show for NBC. Advertising Sales for Elevate Magazine in NC. PR firm to state treasurer and senate members. Founded the National Miss Latina Pageant w/by Coca-Cola and the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation of Microsoft. Introduced advanced research and metrics for performance at outsourcing projects for two call centers in Latin America, one in Guatemala for TXU and one in Costa Rica for a telephone company. Extensive global travel to conduct business set up and consulting. Worked with local chambers of commerce and served as keynote speaker at several conventions, seminars and focus groups. Served in human relations commission and volunteer center. Adviser to the airline, communications, banking, insurance, education, health and entertainment industries. Printed a weekly newspaper and monthly magazine. Supervised advertising budgets, event promotions and marketing programs. Maintained relationship with major agencies and small business owners to deliver advertising solutions. Organized 500 corporations for business-to-business trade shows.  Writer, actor, producer, & director. Featured as an FBI detective on Discovery Channel / FBI Files. Voice for MBenz and Honda brands on television and national marketing programs. An accomplished accordion player, percussionist and sought-after photographer. Received Google Certification in online advertising Ad Words and Google Analitics. SEM & SEO in 2010. Landing page optimization, HTML and CSS. InDesign, Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Salesforce tools and MS Office. Developed language translation and interpreting programs. Joined 202 Magazine in AZ as Production Manager/Art Director.

Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
Dean's List, President's List and Honor's List. International Business Club Secretary. Executive Producer at Student Media/Niner Video. Developed 30 minute video-yearbook with over 80hrs of footage.

recommendations: November 28, 2012, Kymla worked with Carlos but at different companies

Carlos is a consummate professional in all respects.  He volunteered to perform and help promote our annual fundraising event Don't Stop the Music in the fall of 2012.  Don't Stop the Music 2012 was our third annual 24-hour non-stop music fundraising pledge drive to support music therapy services in the Phoenix Metro area held every year at Arizona State University in conjunction with the ASU Music Therapy Program providing music therapy services to over 300 children and adults each week. I met Carlos at his performance at the Tempe Center for the Arts in August 2012.  He is an excellent communicator and organizer.  Carlos demonstrates genuine compassion and engagement in his projects.  We are grateful to have had him as a performer and promoter with Don't Stop the Music.  I highly recommend Carlos Solis.

November 16, 2012, Sterling worked with Carlos but at different companies

Carlos Solis, did photography for an eBook we are publishing called "WordToday", a 365 daily inspirational, christian calendar. He did an excellent job capturing each photo we needed for the book and we have also observed him on a couple occasions working with other clients and helping them to achieve this level of quality in their projects. I highly recommend Carlos and his services as a brilliant Photographer; who finds the greatest moments in the lives of the people he comes in contact with. He works well with others in every event he photographs and offers 110% of his skill and creativity in order capture each person or place, in a favorable light. Carlos, is an amazing photographer that goes above and beyond the call of duty, professionally; and I would hire him again without hesitation to work with my company. Sincerely, Sterling Hockamier, Media Consultant Conversion Point Publishing, Co. 11640 N. 51st Ave., #118 Glendale, Arizona 85304

Sterling offered great value and quality film & music production work for my company, as I was contracted to film and record Anwesha-international artist from Bollywood, India at the Scottsdale Performance Arts Center. He delivered a master DVD with the appropriate sound and images, on time and with more features than I expected. Sterling is a great business to contract for music, digital recordings and studio engineered productions. I would hire Sterling and his company in future projects of this nature that require attention to detail.

summary: Founder of media companies in North Carolina & New York. 2 newspapers and one magazine. Currently working corporate strategy and marketing assignments that include the vast multicultural markets, such as the Spanish language design and delivery of programs to reach consumers in the United States. Works completed include hotel, banking, health, transportation, education, communication and entertainment industries. Significantly increased revenues for global sales at MDhelicopters, Google, Inc., CitiGroup, NBC_Universal, American Express, Bank of America, America West Airlines, and Mercedes Benz. The list keeps growing and despite what some say about the high-cost of living in this part of the hemisphere, I am enjoying myself in the west coast. I graduated with a bachelors degree in international business at the University of North Carolina (Charlotte Campus) and also have an Aviation Management and Pilot program licensure at Guilford Tech, both in North Carolina. During my tenure at various boards, I have sat as a chair to the Consumer Credit Bureau of the Family Foundation in NC, The Business School, The Girls Scouts, The Red Cross and the United Way among others. Specialties: Sales, trainer and business development team lead. A consultant for language projects to include synchronized interpreting. Translated books, websites and marketing documents into Spanish. Responsible for product development, market and competitor research. Initiated investments, funding vs financing, vertical integration of products and services within industry specific markets. In my spare time if I am not playing soccer, tennis or on a photography assignment, I do acting for television and have helped produced a couple of major motion pictures with the 'Hollywood' types. I have been labeled a down-to-earth, humble, and hard-working individual with strong connections and a powerful approach to getting things done. Title I do not take lightly. www.carlos-solis.com
